xwikidoc.creator: XWiki.sdumitriu
xwikidoc.author: XWiki.sdumitriu
xwikidoc.title: IRC Archive for channel #ccm on 11 March 2014
xwikidoc.content: <IonelPopescu> has joined #ccm 10:14 <Guest38811> has joined #ccm 10:42 <Guest38811> has joined #ccm 10:43 <Guest38811> anyone knows if the mobile web development in PhenoTips is of priority this year? 11:03 <SayAsh_> has joined #ccm 11:03 <Guest38811> has joined #ccm 11:23 <Guest38811> j 11:23 <Guest38811> anyone for the phenotips project? 11:23 <sdumitriu> Me 11:24 <Guest38811> do u know if it is still of priority? 11:24 <sdumitriu> The secret for a successful GSoC is never to propose critical projects :) 11:24 <Guest38811> the mailing list seems to be inactive 11:25 <sdumitriu> So all the proposed projects are important, but none are critical 11:25 <sdumitriu> It's better to select good students than important projects 11:26 <sdumitriu> Anyway, that one is the most popular project, so the competition is high 11:26 <sdumitriu> And I've seen your email 11:26 <sdumitriu> It 11:27 <sdumitriu> It's just that we're all trying hard to finish something else right now, we'll answer soon 11:27 <sdumitriu> You do know that teamwork is forbidden, right? 11:29 <Guest38811> has joined #ccm 11:33 <sdumitriu> Guest38811: You might have missed a few lines, check the logs http://phenotips.org/IRC/ccmArchive20140311 15:09 <Csine> has joined #ccm 15:09 <Csine> Hi 15:09 <sdumitriu> Hi Csine 15:10 <Csine> is this the right IRC for computational medicine? 15:10 <sdumitriu> Yes 15:10 <Csine> YAY 15:10 <Csine> first time really using IRC its pretty niffy 15:10 <Csine> havent used it since middle school 15:11 <Csine> I have a few questions about some of the project and was wondering if it was possible to talk about them here 15:13 <Csine> has joined #ccm 15:14 <Csine> Sorry got D/c 15:15 <sdumitriu> Csine: Depends what projects 15:16 <Csine> I was looking at the Development of machine learning methods for modeling the evolution of tumors 15:16 <Csine> it sounds interesting and it falls pretty well at what I'm studying 15:16 <ohotin> has joined #ccm 15:20 <sdumitriu> CCM is an umbrella organization for different projects, and only some of them use IRC; unfortunately that project is not on IRC 15:21 <sdumitriu> Quaid provided some details yesterday, make sure you didn't look at it before that 15:21 <sdumitriu> There are links to the existing code and a paper describing the method 15:22 <sdumitriu> If you've looked at those and have more specific questions, you should send an email to Quaid (his email is in the project description) 15:22 <Csine> Ahh I see thank you!~ 15:23 <sdumitriu> You're welcome 15:44 <botalovs> has joined #ccm 17:28 <stolovaya> has joined #ccm 17:45 <qwebirc54442> has joined #ccm 19:12 <carum> has joined #ccm 21:02 <SayAsh> has joined #ccm 21:37 <SayAsh> has joined #ccm
